table_description: AWS RDS DB Instance Automated Backup

columns.name: db_instance_identifier
columns.description: The friendly name to identify the DB Instance.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the replicated automated backups.

columns.name: db_instance_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the automated backups.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Specifies the current state of this database.

columns.name: allocated_storage
columns.description: Specifies the allocated storage size in gibibytes (GiB).

columns.name: availability_zone
columns.description: The Availability Zone that the automated backup was created in.

columns.name: backup_retention_period
columns.description: The retention period for the automated backups.

columns.name: backup_target
columns.description: Specifies where automated backups are stored: Amazon Web Services Outposts or the Amazon Web Services Region.

columns.name: dbi_resource_id
columns.description: The identifier for the source DB instance, which can't be changed and which is unique to an Amazon Web Services Region.

columns.name: encrypted
columns.description: Specifies whether the automated backup is encrypted.

columns.name: engine
columns.description: The name of the database engine for this automated backup.

columns.name: engine_version
columns.description: The version of the database engine for the automated backup.

columns.name: iam_database_authentication_enabled
columns.description: True if mapping of Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management (IAM) accounts to database accounts is enabled, and otherwise false.

columns.name: instance_create_time
columns.description: True if mapping of Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management (IAM) accounts to database accounts is enabled, and otherwise false.

columns.name: iops
columns.description: True if mapping of Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management (IAM) accounts to database accounts is enabled, and otherwise false.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: The Amazon Web Services KMS key ID for an automated backup. The Amazon Web Services KMS key identifier is the key ARN, key ID, alias ARN, or alias name for the KMS key.

columns.name: license_model
columns.description: The Amazon Web Services KMS key ID for an automated backup. The Amazon Web Services KMS key identifier is the key ARN, key ID, alias ARN, or alias name for the KMS key.

columns.name: master_username
columns.description: The license model of an automated backup.

columns.name: option_group_name
columns.description: The option group the automated backup is associated with. If omitted, the default option group for the engine specified is used.

columns.name: port
columns.description: The port number that the automated backup used for connections. Default: Inherits from the source DB instance Valid Values: 1150-65535.

columns.name: storage_throughput
columns.description: Specifies the storage throughput for the automated backup.

columns.name: storage_type
columns.description: Specifies the storage type associated with the automated backup.

columns.name: tde_credential_arn
columns.description: The ARN from the key store with which the automated backup is associated for TDE encryption.

columns.name: timezone
columns.description: The time zone of the automated backup.

columns.name: vpc_id
columns.description: Provides the VPC ID associated with the DB instance.

columns.name: db_instance_automated_backups_replications
columns.description: The list of replications to different Amazon Web Services Regions associated with the automated backup.

columns.name: restore_window
columns.description: Earliest and latest time an instance can be restored to.
